author: joseiadicicco
title: Platform for Cardano Solar Farms
description: サンファンはアルゼンチンLATAMの中でも最も貧しい地域のひとつで、日照時間が長く、水やエネルギーの不足により、劣悪な生活環境にあります。

f6_assessments.q0: この提案は価値が高く、チャレンジの目的と非常によく合致していると思います。この提案は、ソーラーエネルギーファームを作り、投資家はトークンを使って、カルダノブロックチェーンを通じてプロジェクトに投資するというものです。このプロジェクトでは、クリーンで再生可能なエネルギーを使用し、選ばれた都市にすでに存在する太陽光の投影率が高いという特徴を利用するため、大陸の両方に利益がもたらされます。また、トークンを使った投資に焦点を当てることで、流通するデジタルネイティブの数を増やし、カルダノの採用を促進することができるため、カルダノのエコシステムにも利益がもたらされます。今回の資金調達は、このプロジェクトの第一段階のみを対象としているのが少し気になりますが、エネルギー生成には常に非常に高いコストがかかりますので、これは理解できます。エコロジー的に正しいエネルギーに投資することは、すべての人にとってより良い未来を促進するという意味で、カルダノの一般的な目的と対話することになると思います。
f6_assessments.q1: チームは、12週間という時間を半分に分けて台本を作成します。前半では、具体的にどのような目標を立て、それを達成するためにはどのような活動が必要なのかを時系列的に詳しく説明します。前半では、どのような目標を立て、どのような活動をするのかを時系列で具体的に説明し、それに続く労働時間（240時間）と報酬を提示しています。また、この最初のステップでは、2人の人間が作業をするとしているが、誰なのかを紹介するのも面白いだろう。第6週から第12週までの残りの時間も同じように、何が起こるのか、何人が働くのか、報酬はいくらなのかがわかっている。この方法は非常にシンプルで効率的です。何が期待されているのかを正確に理解し、プロセスを正確に視覚化することができます。さらに、著者は後のことも話しており、今回の資金提供は第一段階にしか対応していませんが、プロジェクトの完全なビジョンを持っていることを示しています。最後に、チームについてですが、彼らが誰であるか、名前、プロジェクトでの役割、これまでに行ってきたことについて、簡単ではあるが十分な説明がなされています。彼らが従来の職業に加えて、プールの開発などを通じてカルダノのエコシステムにしっかりと関わっていることは非常に好ましいことです。このようにして、チームとプロジェクトを成功させる能力に対する多くの自信が伝わってくる。
f6_assessments.q2: ここでの監査可能性は良好ですが、上で分析した項目ほどではありません。このチームは、3ヶ月、6ヶ月、12ヶ月の期間で、期待される結果を示しています。しかし、これはやや複雑なプロジェクトであるため、より詳細な情報を得ることが重要になるでしょう。これらの指標は、それぞれ非常にシンプルで短いものです。1週間のフォローアップ、つまり12のトピックを詳しく説明して、各週の具体的な目標を示してくれれば、もっと面白くなるだろう。彼らは、プロジェクトがどのように進められているかを議論するために、毎月カルダノコミュニティとのミーティングを開催し、そのミーティングでは、その月の結果について整理されたデータを報告することができます。非常に特殊で異なるプロジェクトなので、このプロジェクトに同行する人をコミュニティから選出するというフィードバックは、チーム自身が行う方が適切だと思いますが...。再生可能エネルギーの経験がある人でなければ、それはかなり興味深いことだと思いますいずれにしても、チームはプロジェクトの進捗状況を監視する手段を提供してくれていますが、品質の監査を行うには不十分です。

f6_assessments.q0:
I see this proposal as having a lot of potential in bringing value, not only to the local residents of San Juan, Argentina, but also to other places around the world in need of the invaluable resource that is electricity, and as such it will bring value to the entire Cardano ecosystem.
Adding a successful tokenomics system to the building and usage of solar panels is a great idea and a high likelihood of bridging the gap between blockchain investors and residents of the small communities where these investments will be made.
f6_assessments.q1: The team already has experience in the solar energy domain, local knowledge, from being residents of Argentina and as stake pool operators they have knowledge and investment in the Cardano blockchain. All these aspects give a high chance of success to the proposal, not just from the knowledge and skills they possess but also from their financial and personal investment into the well being of the Argentinian and Cardano community.
f6_assessments.q2:
Their timeline, KPIs and budget are sensible. They present the knowledge they have, but also the one they do not. The budget for this first phase of the project is to set up a reliable foundation for a project that could be used all around the world. Research into the necessary roadmap for setting up a solar farm and research for a tokenomics system, that will be the one incentivising investors from all over the world to participate in this endeavour on the Cardano blockchain.
The project should be easy to evaluate for progress.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal effectively addresses the challenge by onboarding new cardano users in latin america through a green energy program. The proposers will develop a platform for worldwide investment in green energy in latin america. I believe that this model can be incredibly effective because it encourages latin american citizens to get into green energy and blockchain (specifically cardano), while also providing an investment opportunity for individuals abroad. Thus, this project has the potential to greatly benefit people living in latin america by providing more income to small solar farm owners and also decrease pollution by generating electricity through renewable means. (score given: 5)
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposers both have lots of experience with cardano and the energy sector, both of which will hugely important when implementing this project. Given the experience information they provided, I believe that they will successfully implement the project.

The proposers' plan to visit energy farms in the San Juan region and then develop their business model and tokenomics seems achievable in the given timeframe. They listed a lot of good detail that indicates that the proposers will be dedicated to making this project a reality. Additionally, they have listed a good budget with strong reasoning for the exact amount requested. Overall, I believe that this first phase of the project will be successful. (score given: 5)
f6_assessments.q2: The proposers provided sufficient information to audit the progress and success of the proposal. They have listed the key milestones for each period of the project (roughly 3 month chunks). The final report from the first phase can also be a good way for the cardano community to check on the progress of the proposal. I would, however, have appreciated some more details on other key performance indicators that the proposers can keep the community updated with, such as number of solar farms potentially involved with the project and number of investors. These are metrics that can potentially be added in the future as the project develops. Also, the proposers should clarify how they will keep the cardano community updated (what means of communication) and how frequently they will submit reports to inform the community. These are minor concerns, but addressing them would take the proposal from great to amazing. (score given: 5)

f6_assessments.q0: The problem statement being San Juan which is considered one the poorest areas in Argentina which has highest sunlight exposure but lacks good living conditions. In the proposal the proposer will be developing a Platform which allows investor to participate in the project by offering a GREEN token. This GREEN token represents watts of energy. By utilizing the local weather condition to produce electric energy which would help improve local living conditions and also helps to stop climate change. The proposal addresses the problem
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer have provided a complete detailed plan each with timelines and also targets to achieve them within a time period. The proposer and their team based on details provided has required experience enough to implement the proposal successfully. Therefore it's very much possible this proposal will executed successfully
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer has provided a detailed phases that they will be carrying out and each with a timeline this will be very helpful to track the progress and they have given a detailed budget breakdown required to carryout each of the phases hence the information given should be enough to audit the development and success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal is laudable aiming to solve the weather challenges in San Juan (Argentina) through the creation of a platform that will allow investors to participate in the project through GREEN network. The proposal mentioned that SanJuan has the longest sunshine hours and the best solar production, although there are already some solar farm in place, they are not available for small investors to participate via blockchain. Their aim is to setup a model called Cardano blockchain solar farm . The challenge is addressed effectively.
f6_assessments.q1: The team is made up of 2 experts who have SPO (ADA ONE Pool), more than 20 years experience, telecommunication projects, both of them organized Cardano Summit 2021, and they have the capability to implement the project successfully. The plan mentioned 3 phases of work schedule for the project.
f6_assessments.q2: The road map is 12 months timeline for the project and the budget breakdown is comprehensive for effective auditing .

f6_assessments.q0: I believe this proposal can answer the need of energy for the residents in Argentina LATAM. However, I would think that the proposal should spell out the responsibility of operating and maintaining the solar farm.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal lays out their detailed plans of actions for the first phase and it also lists out the pointers for the second and third phases.  I have confidence that with the team members experience and expertise, the proposal can be implemented with success. However I failed to see their plan as to how to reach out the investors.
f6_assessments.q2: I believe there should be also a measure of success as to the amount of investment gathered for to meet the budget of setting up a solar farm.  That I did not find it in the proposal.

solution: GREENトークン（Xワットのエネルギーを表す）を使って、投資家がプロジェクトに参加できるプラットフォームをCardanoネットワーク上に構築する。
experience: ITスペシャリスト、SPO、通信、太陽エネルギー、インフラ、エンジニアリング、ネットワーク管理システム。
